name: Kubernetes Cluster with Nginx Deployment
description: Kubernetes - An orchestration system for containerized applications, e.g., Nginx.

metadata.longDescription: Deploys a Kubernetes Cluster in VMware, where Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. This deployment also deploys the NGINX sample application to validate the deployment is operational, where NGINX is an open source web server and load balancer for high-traffic sites.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
VMWare: 2+ virtual machines:
  • - 1 Kubernetes Master;
  • - 1+ Kubernetes Minions, with the following software installed (their distribution is determined by Kubernetes)
    • 1 Kubernetes Dashboard container
    • 1+ NGINX containers

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description:
1. Kubernetes:an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications
2. Nginx:an open-source, high-performance HTTP server and reverse proxy, as well as an IMAP/POP3 proxy server

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • Kubernetes Master:
        • Cores - 2
        • Memory - 4GB
        • Storage - Depends on Image
      • Kubernetes Minions:
        • Cores - 2
        • Memory - 4GB
        • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Allows HTTP to all destinations
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • Kubernetes Master:
        • Availability - Not enabled
      • Kubernetes Minions:
        • Availability - Not enabled

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
• 1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  • 2. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  • 3. More details of software can be found in https://kubernetes.io/ and https://nginx.org/en/.
